name: Beef Banana Blossom Pesto
description: This Beef Banana Blossom Pesto recipe is a delightful fusion of flavors, perfect for those who are looking for a low-carb and low-sugar option without sacrificing taste. It's a healthy and novel way to enjoy beef brisket, combined with the unique taste of banana blossom and classic pesto, seasoned to perfection with black pepper and garlic powder. A must-try for anyone seeking healthy yet delicious meals.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Banana Blossom under cold water and chop it into bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the Beef Brisket into thin strips, making sure they are of uniform thickness for even cooking.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Season the Beef Brisket strips with 2 teaspoons of black pepper and 2 teaspoons of garlic powder, ensuring each piece is evenly coated.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan over medium heat, cook the seasoned Beef Brisket strips until they are browned and cooked through, about 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chopped Banana Blossom to the pan with the beef, and cook for an additional 5 minutes or until the banana blossom is tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in 64 grams of Classic Pesto to the pan, mixing well to ensure the beef and banana blossom are well coated with the pesto. Heat through for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
